product_name: The North Face Pacific Creek Board Shorts - Men's
long_description: Whether you're surfing or getting out on a stand up paddlboard, stretchy, sun-protective Pacific Creek Board Shorts from The North Face will be your constant companion all summer long. Polyester fabric dries quickly when you step out of the water. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. 4-way stretch back panel and the fully gusseted crotch allow great range of motion. Hand pockets and a zippered thigh pocket with a drain hole hold your essentials; zippered thigh pocket includes a key loop. Includes a snap closure at the waist and rip-and-stick fly. The North Face Pacific Creek Board Shorts have a relaxed fit.
short_description: Whether you're surfing or getting out on a stand up paddlboard, stretchy, sun-protective Pacific Creek Board Shorts from The North Face will be your constant companion all summer long.
